lines.text: On a scale of one-to-ten, in terms of... universe-dominating greatness, where would you place, say... oh, me?
A ten sire, most definitely.

[musing]
A ten? Hmmm...
[becoming more annoyed]
Well yes, of course a Ten. What else would you think? A six?
What we lack in brains, we make up for with good intentions.
That's my wife you got there! That's my planet you're blowing up! And that's... that's just some guy I met, but still, I think this thing has gone just a little too far!
How do you like me now?
I'll have you know, Marge Nelson, it's not the size of your planet, it's how you use it!
This is very important... open my pants.
What are you doing in my head?

[Voiceover]
At the very edge of the galaxy is our world. The tiny planet known, as Spengo. For many decades, I was the king of this planet. The people were happy and their lives were good... But also, alas, we were a planet of idiots. Then, one day, the most bloodthirsty, fearsome villain had ever seen seized power, imprisoned me, and renamed the planet after himself. His name - Todd Spengo.
[Todd Spengo is walking and runs into a low pipe]
Well alright, so he's not exactly fearsome - but he certainly caught us by surprise.
General Afir, how much longer?
The death ray is ready great one!
[Excited noises]
[Walks forward, his guards follow]

[Voiceover]
Did I mention we were a planet of idiots?
[the guards run into the same pipe]

[after finding out that Afir is planning to dethrone him]
So, what do you think of me now, Afir?
I think you're a small, pathetic, insignificant, little criten.
Oh, really. Well, what do you think of me now?
[stabs Afir with the needle with fake love potion, and which he then injects into to]

[Acting lovey-dovey]
Uh, Todd. I love you, marry me?
Nope, sorry. Marrying Marge.
